input.sentences: the family gets together every year to celebrate the fathers birthday .
here 's the guest of honor with his wife and sister .
this picture shows his sons and daughters .
here are the grand kids goofing around .
here 's his wife and sister enjoying some happy memories .
output.sentences: The family celerated fathers day together.
The father's wife and sister both attended to honor the man on this father's day.
There were many pictures taken with the son and daughter.
The juvial day consisted of the grandkids goofing around among each other.
The wife and sister both felt the day was filled with lovely memories they would cherish.
